alert.note: Alert for Allen; De Kalb; Lagrange; Noble; Steuben; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 4:14PM EDT until June 25 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR STEUBEN...NORTHERN ALLEN...EASTERN NOBLE...NORTHEASTERN WHITLEY...DE KALB AND SOUTHEASTERN LAGRANGE COUNTIES... At 414 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles west of Angola to near Waterloo to Churubusco, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Auburn and Waterloo around 420 PM EDT. Angola around 425 PM EDT. Butler and Hamilton around 430 PM EDT. Garrett around 435 PM EDT. Grabill around 440 PM EDT. St. Joe around 445 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Brimfield, Butler Center, York, Alvarado, Fairfield Center, Brushy Prairie, Saint Johns, Merriam, Blue Lake and Big Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 318 and 352. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 150 and 156. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern Indiana...and northwestern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; De Kalb; Lagrange; Noble; Steuben; Whitley
